content.rendered:
PROUDLY PRESENTING

TIRE CHANGING PLATFORM

This heavy duty aluminum skid style mounting system was designed and built for the Canadian Forces Support Unit Ottawa. The unit allows for lifting with a forklift from either end or the sides and also has recessed lifting rings for sling lifting.

The unit comes with direct attachment for the hydraulic cylinder and hydraulic power unit and storage cabinets for the small parts and tools required.
